title: Facet-specific photoreduction and immobilization of Cr(VI) on hematite nanocrystals
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3510-3521
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00040D, Paper
Chaorong Chen, Haiyang Xian, Jing Liu, Qingze Chen, Xiaoliang Liang, Runliang Zhu, Michael F. Hochella
